Nouse's Best Albums of 2013

By Gracie Daw

2013 saw many things, including the death of Margaret Thatcher, the 'Iron Lady', the birth of a future king and Miley Cyrus breaking the internet. But the music released this year was phenomenal as well. Nouse's writers take you through some of the albums that shaped 2013.

Singing in the Rain

The Family Rain may define themselves in purely materialistic terms but for them it's all about the music.

Kodaline and their Perfect World

Alex Killeen catches up with Jason Boland, chatting Birmingham truths, recording the album and keeping their music about the music.
